RAD_SUMMARY.RAD_SUMMARY_WHERECLAUSE: exists (Select 1 From OLVW_USER_ACCESS_PRODUCTS Where PRODUCT_CODE = sypks_utils.get_product(CONTRACT_REF_NO) AND USER_ID = global.user_id)

RAD_LOVS.LOV_QUERY: SELECT A.CONTRACT_REF_NO, A.USER_REF_NO FROM OLTBS_CONTRACT_MASTER A ,OLTBS_CONTRACT B WHERE A.CONTRACT_REF_NO = B.CONTRACT_REF_NO AND A.CONTRACT_REF_NO <> A.TRANCHE_REF_NO AND B.MODULE_CODE = 'LB' AND A.CURRENCY <> (SELECT CURRENCY FROM OLTBS_CONTRACT_MASTER WHERE CONTRACT_REF_NO = A.TRANCHE_REF_NO AND VERSION_NO = (SELECT MAX(VERSION_NO) FROM OLTBS_CONTRACT_MASTER WHERE TRANCHE_REF_NO = A.TRANCHE_REF_NO AND CONTRACT_REF_NO = A.TRANCHE_REF_NO)) AND VERSION_NO = (SELECT MAX(VERSION_NO) FROM OLTBS_CONTRACT_MASTER WHERE CONTRACT_REF_NO = A.CONTRACT_REF_NO) AND A.CONTRACT_STATUS IN ('A','Y') AND A.MODULE = 'LB' AND A.MATURITY_DATE >= (SELECT NVL(MAX(EXRATE_EFFECTIVE_END_DATE),TO_CHAR(GLOBAL.MIN_DATE,'DD-MON-YYYY')) FROM LBTBS_EXRATE_FIXING_DETAILS WHERE CONTRACT_REF_NO = A.CONTRACT_REF_NO) AND 1 > (SELECT count(*) FROM LBTBS_EXRATE_FIXING_DETAILS ex WHERE CONTRACT_REF_NO = A.CONTRACT_REF_NO AND ((EXRATE_EFFECTIVE_START_DATE > GLOBAL.APPLICATION_DATE and B.CONTRACT_STATUS <> 'Y' AND EXISTS (select 1 from oltb_contract_event_log ae where ae.contract_ref_no = ex.Contract_Ref_No and ae.EVENT_CODE in ('EXFX') and ex.event_seq_no = ae.event_seq_no and ae.AUTH_STATUS = 'A')) or (EXRATE_FIXING_DATE > GLOBAL.APPLICATION_DATE and B.CONTRACT_STATUS = 'Y'))) AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM olvws_avl_prod_br_usr WHERE product_code = sypks_utils.get_product(A.CONTRACT_REF_NO) AND branch_code = global.current_branch AND user_id = global.user_id)
